name: Various Aspects of Science Quiz | Sci / Tech | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many less chambers are there in a reptilian heart than in a human heart?
questions.explanation:
1.

	Reptiles have three chambered hearts, while humans have four.

questions.text: Is the quadriceps a flexor or extensor?

Small insects (such as ants) have large surface areas and low weights. They quickly reach terminal velocity of only a few centimeters a second. Therefore, an ant can fall from the Empire State Building and walk away unharmed after hitting the sidewalk.
A concave lens bends rays of light away from each other.
When your finger is positioned to flick something, what kind of energy are you using?
What element is all Earth's life based on?
Can viruses reproduce without another organism's cells?

questions.explanation:
cochlea.

	The cochlea is actually not a bone. It is a liquid-filled part of the internal ear. It reacts to the vibration of the hammer, anvil, and stirrup.
